name: Fault (itch) (games made with Wooden Swords)
description:
You are a creature in a bubble being experimented on against your will - and now’s your chance to break free and become stable.

Run and dodge from the doctor’s chase - and their tranquilizer guns - until enough of your power has built up.
When your meter is full, you can unleash your full potential.

They know nothing of what you are capable of . . .
